Zone and Ecoregion
========================================================

```{r}
omnr.glm <- data.frame(zone=rep(c("mea","int"),c(3,3)),ecoregion=rep(c("E3","W3","S3")),suppressed=c(60,194,111,152,91,44),unsuppressed=c(20,67,19,20,43,10))

omnr.glm

glm.eq <- "cbind(suppressed, unsuppressed) ~ zone + ecoregion"

glm.out <- glm(glm.eq, family=binomial(logit), data=omnr.glm)

summary(glm.out)
```

```{r}
exp(-0.71423)                         # antilog of the zone/mea coefficient
# This shows that measured zone was at a significant disadvantage when ecoregion and the interaction are controlled.
```

```{r}
1/exp(-0.71423)
# All else being equal, the odds of a fire in the intensive zone being suppressed were 2 times the odds of a fire in the measured zone being suppressed.
```

```{r}
anova(glm.out, test="Chisq")
```
